parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 1.12

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Locations

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Add speech to location.

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> location '''setSpeech''' speech

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> location: [[Location]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> speech: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_location [[setSpeech]] "SomeSpeech";</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[nearestLocationWithDubbing]]
</value></part></template></root>
